ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: We want to thank all the work conducted by the influenza researchers reference in this document that has contributed to the development of the LAIV approaches described in this manuscript. We want to apologize if we inadvertently omitted any manuscript(s) describing a new approach for the development of LAIV. Research on influenza in our laboratory is partially supported by the New York Influenza Center of Excellence (NYICE), a member of the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases (NIAID), National Institutes of Health (NIH), Department of Health and Human Services, Centers of Excellence for Influenza Research and Surveillance (CEIRS) contract No. HHSN272201400005C, the Department of Defense (DoD) PR17046 and by The University of Rochester Technology Development Funds.
